alert.note: Alert for Alger; Baraga; Delta; Dickinson; Iron; Luce; Marquette; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued September 28 at 2:49PM EDT until September 29 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Baraga, Marquette, Alger, Luce, Iron, Dickinson, Delta, Southern Schoolcraft and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freeze conditions will be more prevalent farther inland as temperatures near the Great Lakes are expected to be near or above freezing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Alger; Baraga; Delta; Dickinson; Iron; Luce; Marquette; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft
